name: Piri Piri Shrimp Stir Fry
preparation: Chop sweet potatoes and place in Multipurpose Steamer. Cover; microwave on high for 10 min, or until tender.
Cut broccoli into florets and remove strings from peas.
Meanwhile, heat oil in Wok over medium-high heat. Add broccoli and cook 2-3 min. Then add shrimp, peas, and seasoning. Cook 3-4 min, or until prawns are pink and firm. Stir in cooked sweet potatoes.
Peel and slice avocado. Cut lemon into wedges.
Divide stir fry between 4 plates and top with avocado. Serve with lemon wedges.
tips: Stir in 2 tbsp Red Pepper Jelly to add a little sweet heat!
Substitute shrimp for 1 lb (450g) boneless skinless chicken breast for a budget friendly option.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate.
